Imports

shapes, geometry, basictypes, materials, pfm, transformation, cameras

Types

GrammarError = object of CatchableError
InputStream = object
  stream*: Stream
  location*: SourceLocation
  saved_char*: char
  saved_location*: SourceLocation
  tabulation*: int
  saved_token*: Option[Token]

KeywordEnum = enum
  NEW = 1, MATERIAL = 2, PLANE = 3, SPHERE = 4, DIFFUSE = 5, SPECULAR = 6,
  UNIFORM = 7, CHECKERED = 8, IMAGE = 9, IDENTITY = 10, TRANSLATION = 11,
  ROTATION_X = 12, ROTATION_Y = 13, ROTATION_Z = 14, SCALING = 15, CAMERA = 16,
  ORTHOGONAL = 17, PERSPECTIVE = 18, FLOAT = 19, AABOX = 20, CYLINDER = 21,
  LIGHTSOURCE = 22
Scene = object
  world*: World
  materials*: Table[string, Material]
  camera*: Option[Camera]
  float_variables*: Table[string, float]
  overridden_variables*: HashSet[string]

SourceLocation = object
  file_name*: string
  line_num*: int
  col_num*: int

Token = ref TokenValue
TokenKind = enum
  KeywordToken, IdentifierToken, StringToken, LiteralNumberToken, SymbolToken,
  StopToken
TokenValue = object
  location*: SourceLocation
  case kind*: TokenKind
  of KeywordToken:
      keyword*: KeywordEnum

  of IdentifierToken:
      identifier*: string

  of StringToken:
      s*: string

  of LiteralNumberToken:
      value*: float

  of SymbolToken:
      symbol*: string

  of StopToken:
      flag*: bool

Consts

SYMBOLS = ['(', ')', '[', ']', '<', '>', '*', ',']
WHITESPACE = ['\x00', '\t', '\n', '\r', ' ']

proc expectIdentifier(input_file: var InputStream): string {.
    ...raises: [IOError, OSError, GrammarError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Read a token from input_file and check that it is an identifier. Return the name of the identifier. 
proc expectKeywords(input_file: var InputStream; keywords: seq[KeywordEnum]): KeywordEnum {.
    ...raises: [IOError, OSError, GrammarError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Read a token from input_file and check that it is one of the keywords in keywords. Return the keyword as a KeywordEnum object. 
proc expectNumber(input_file: var InputStream; scene: Scene): float {.
    ...raises: [IOError, OSError, GrammarError, KeyError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Read a token from input_file and check that it is either a literal number or a variable in scene. Return the number as a float. 
proc expectString(input_file: var InputStream): string {.
    ...raises: [IOError, OSError, GrammarError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Read a token from input_file and check that it is a literal string. Return the value of the string (a str).

    ...raises: [IOError, OSError, GrammarError], tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
